content: The adjoint school is open for applications! http://adjointschool.com/apply
So I have absolutely no idea who the organisers are this year and I can't find the information on the site..... does anyone around here know?

Looking here: http://adjointschool.com/index.html#2021
It says: "The organizers of Adjoint School 2021 are David Jaz Myers, Sophie Libkind, and Brendan Fong."
Cool! I'll announce the ACT2021 Adjoint School. (Jamie Vicary is running ACT2021 so he's the person to ask basic questions like "who's running the school?")

David Egolf said:

Looking here: http://adjointschool.com/index.html#2021
It says: "The organizers of Adjoint School 2021 are David Jaz Myers, Sophie Libkind, and Brendan Fong."

I can't read, thanks!
